price: Kandi nta kindi muri buhemberwe kitari ibyo mwakoze.
arabic: وَمَا تُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wamā tuj'zawna illā mā kuntum taʿmalūna
